sentences.sContent: They thought she would be popular, warm and easygoing, but not demanding and difficult.
sentences.sCn: 他们认为她会是受人欢迎的，温情的，随和的，而非挑三拣四难以追求的。

sentences.sContent: "My first impression was that he was an honest guy, easygoing, apologizing and apologizing," Chen said. "And he bowed.
sentences.sCn: “他给我的第一印象是觉得他是个老实人，挺随和的，一直在道歉，”老陈说，“而且他还鞠了躬。

sentences.sContent: You bet I am proud, but what really matters to me is that she grew up to be warm and kind, with an easygoing, unassuming demeanor.
sentences.sCn: 你一定会说我骄傲，但对我来说，真正重要的是，我的孩子长大了，有一颗热情善良的心，为人随和，不装模作样。

synos.tran: 悠闲的；逍遥自在的；脾气随和的；不严肃的
